member.summary: Gets or sets the date this SMS should be sent.

member.name: P:Olive.Services.SMS.ISmsQueueItem.DateSent

member.name: P:Olive.Services.SMS.ISmsQueueItem.Retries

member.name: T:Olive.Services.SMS.ISMSSender
member.summary: Represents a component that actually delivers SMS messages. This should be implemented for any 3rd party SMS gateway.

member.name: M:Olive.Services.SMS.ISMSSender.Deliver(Olive.Services.SMS.ISmsQueueItem)
member.summary: Delivers the specified SMS message. The implementation of this method should not handle exceptions. Any exceptions will be logged by the engine.

member.name: M:Olive.Services.SMS.SmsExtensions.RecordRetry(Olive.Services.SMS.ISmsQueueItem)
member.summary: Records an unsuccessful attempt to send this SMS.

member.name: M:Olive.Services.SMS.SmsExtensions.MarkSent(Olive.Services.SMS.ISmsQueueItem)
member.summary: Updates the DateSent field of this item and then soft deletes it.

member.name: M:Olive.Services.SMS.SmsExtensions.Send(Olive.Services.SMS.ISmsQueueItem)
member.summary: Sends the specified SMS item. It will try several times to deliver the message. The number of retries can be specified in AppConfig of "SMS.Maximum.Retries". If it is not declared in web.config, then 3 retires will be used. Note: The actual SMS Sender component must be implemented as a public type that implements ISMSSender interface. The assembly qualified name of that component, must be specified in AppConfig of "SMS.Sender.Type".

member.name: F:Olive.Services.SMS.SmsService.SendError
member.summary: Occurs when an exception happens when sending an sms. Sender parameter will be the ISmsQueueItem instance that couldn't be sent.
